item.title: Announcing BSEfS Iii Tysabiiaw search engine
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
So I was over at Xenlab's blog checking out the search engine he created with the new Google Co-Op service, when I realized that this opened a new opportunity for me. To allow (force) people to search through all the great websites (muck) that I'm interested in! So I proudly announce BSEfS Iii Tysabiiaw (Brian's Search Engine for Stuff I'm interested in that you should also be interested in as well)! Enjoy and search your heads off.
And on a side note, Firefox 2.0 friggen rocks.
